oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New York State Monument, Lookout Battlefield, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the New York State Monument, also known as the New York Peace Memorial, at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. Three informational plaques are visible in the foreground. Features a divided back for correspondence. [No. 179] This postcard comes from the Sykes-Miller Papers Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Lookout Mountain (Tenn.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monuments & memorials; Plaques; Trees
